mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.customer_id AS "customerId", a.coupon_code AS "couponCode", a.code AS "code", a.status AS "status", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", mc.type AS "type", mc.name AS "name", mc.worth AS "worth", mc.discount AS discount, mc.full_reduce AS fullReduce
JOIN medical_coupon mc on a.coupon_code = mc.code
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM medical_coupon_customer a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medical_coupon_customer( id, customer_id, coupon_code, code, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{customerId}, #{couponCode}, #{code}, #{status} )
